comments: Essentially A005572 shifted right twice, and 2 prepended.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..200
formula: G.f.: (1-sqrt(1-8*x+12*x^2))/2 - _Michael Somos_, Jun 08 2000.n*a(n) = (8*n-12)*a(n-1) - 12*(n-3)*a(n-2). [_Richard Choulet_, Dec 16 2009]a(n) ~ 6^(n-1/2)/(2*sqrt(Pi)*n^(3/2)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 11 2013
author: _Clark Kimberling_
